segments.text: I notice the kitchen layout, with the sink on the right and cabinets opposite.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's in her dress and apron, methodically drying the plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water runs from the faucet, filling and spilling over the basin.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A puddle forms below, reaching her shoe without her knowledge.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Stacked dishes sit neatly on the counter beside her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window above reveals a neat garden path and bushes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Open cabinet doors show the cookie jar inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy balances on the two-step stool, hand inside the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool tilts slightly, adding tension to his reach.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl stands close, arm extended toward him expectantly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Curtains frame the window, letting in soft daylight.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a typical domestic moment, full of small details.
segments.speaker: PAR
